text: Jarnac is a commune. It is in Nouvelle-Aquitaine in the Charente department in southwest France. It is the birthplace and resting place of François Mitterrand, President of France (1981–1995). == Geography == Jarnac is on the river Charente. == History == In 1569, it was the site of the Battle of Jarnac. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes in Charente
title: Jarnac
